job_desc: Job Summary:Supervises students entering and exiting school vehicles, monitors student behavior while vehicles are in transit, and assists the driver to ensure safe operation of the vehicle. Qualifications: •	Previous work experience with children preferred•	College graduate preferred•	Intermediate English and fluent Mandarin language skills preferred•	Punctual, patient, assertive with high regard for the safety and wellbeing of children•	Follow strict school guidelines 工作需求時段:Work hours: 6AM-8AM            17:20PM-19:20PM此工作為十個月員工(一年工作十個月)
job_req:
兼職
                            
                            部份工時：自06時00分至08時00分、自17時20分至19時20分
